 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂכַל‎</span> **verb** ==be prudent== ([[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]]<sup>47 denominative</sup> from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׂכֶל‎</span>, but verb early; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָכַל‎</span>, Hithpa\`el ***shew oneself attentive*** (to), ***look***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סְכַל‎</span> (rare) ***understand***, Ithpa\`al ***look*** (at), ***consider***, Aph\`el ***instruct***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂכַל‎</span> only Aph\`el (for Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשְׂכִּיל‎</span>), ***understand, make wise***; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Pa\`el ***teach***, Ethpa\`al ***understand***, etc.; Samaritan <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Ithpa\`al ***look*** (for Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִבִּיט‎</span>); Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šiklu***</u></abbr>, ***clever***, <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šklûtu***</u></abbr>, ***cleverness***, [[BDB#Meissn|Meissn]]<sup>Suppl.93</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span> [[1Sam.18.30|1Sam 18:30]] ***be prudent, circumspect*** ([[BDB#SS|SS]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]]); [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]] [[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]] and others ***prosper.*** **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשְׂכִּיל‎</span> [[Jer.23.5|Jer 23:5]]; [[1Chr.28.19|1Chr 28:19]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשְׂכַּלְתִּי‎</span> [[Ps.119.99|Ps 119:99]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשְׂכִּילוּ‎</span> [[Job.34.27|Job 34:27]] +; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַשְׂכִּיל‎</span> [[1Sam.18.5|1Sam 18:5]] +; 2 masculine singular jussive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּשְׂכַּל‎</span> [[Dan.9.25|Dan 9:25]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשְׂכִּילוּ‎</span> [[Ps.2.10|Ps 2:10]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשְׂכֵּל‎</span> [[Jer.9.23|Jer 9:23]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשְׂכֵּיל‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup> § 53 k</sup>) [[Jer.3.15|Jer 3:15]]; [[Job.34.35|Job 34:35]] ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשְׂכִּיל‎</span> [[Gen.3.6|Gen 3:6]] +, etc.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשְׂכִּיל‎</span> [[1Sam.18.14|1Sam 18:14]] +, feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשְׂכָּ֑לֶת‎</span> [[Prov.19.14|Prov 19:14]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשְׂכִּילִים‎</span> [[Dan.11.35|Dan 11:35]] +, etc.; meanings hard to classify: scholars differ greatly; — 

**1.** ***look at:*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְחְמָד הָעֵץ לְהַשְׂכִּיל‎</span> [[Gen.3.6|Gen 3:6]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) ***was desirable to look upon*** (so [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Ges|Ges]] [[BDB#De|De]]; [[BDB#AV|AV]], [[BDB#RV|RV]] ***to make one wise***; [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]] [[BDB#SS|SS]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] and others below **3**). 

**2.** ***give attention to, consider, ponder:*** [[Isa.41.20|Isa 41:20]]; [[Isa.44.18|Isa 44:18]]; [[Deut.32.29|Deut 32:29]]; [[Ps.64.10|Ps 64:10]]; [[Ps.106.7|Ps 106:7]]; [[Job.34.27|Job 34:27]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> [[Prov.21.12|Prov 21:12]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> [[Ps.41.2|Ps 41:2]]; [[Neh.8.13|Neh 8:13]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> [[Prov.16.20|Prov 16:20]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> [[Ps.101.2|Ps 101:2]]; [[Dan.9.13|Dan 9:13]]. 

**3.** ***have insight, comprehension:*** [[Jer.9.23|Jer 9:23]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָדַע י‎</span>), [[Ps.94.8|Ps 94:8]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּין‎</span>), [[Ps.119.99|Ps 119:99]], [[Dan.1.4|Dan 1:4]]; [[Dan.9.25|Dan 9:25]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָדַע‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשְׂכֵּ(י)ל‎</span> assubstantive = ***insight, understanding:*** as <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s gift to ruler and teacher, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֵּעָה‎</span> [[Jer.3.15|Jer 3:15]] \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דַּ֫עַת‎</span> [[Job.34.35|Job 34:35]] \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַדָּע‎</span> [[Dan.1.17|Dan 1:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוּסַר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשׂ‎</span> [[Prov.1.3|Prov 1:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֶּרֶךְ הַשׂ‎</span> [[Prov.21.16|Prov 21:16]]. 

**4.** ***cause to consider, give insight, teach:*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject, accusative of thing, [[1Chr.28.19|1Chr 28:19]], accusative of person [[Ps.32.8|Ps 32:8]]; [[Neh.9.20|Neh 9:20]] Gabriel subject, 2 accusative [[Dan.9.22|Dan 9:22]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֵב חָכָם‎</span> subject, accusative of thing [[Prov.16.23|Prov 16:23]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span>, [[Prov.21.11|Prov 21:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמַּשְׂכִּילִים שֵׂכֶל טוֺב לי‎</span> [[2Chr.30.22|2Chr 30:22]] (but [[BDB#Be|Be]] [[BDB#Ke|Ke]] [[BDB#Benz|Benz]] etc. ***who shewed*** good ***skill***, that is, in music, v[[2Chr.30.21|2Chr 30:21]]b); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(הַ)מַוְכִּילִים‎</span> [[Dan.11.33|Dan 11:33]]; [[Dan.11.35|Dan 11:35]]; [[Dan.12.3|Dan 12:3]]; [[Dan.12.10|Dan 12:10]] ***the teachers*** (so [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Bev|Bev]]; [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Ke|Ke]] [[BDB#Behrm|Behrm]] and others ***the wise***). 

**5.** ***act circumspectly, prudently:*** absolute [[Amos.5.13|Amos 5:13]]; [[Ps.2.10|Ps 2:10]]; [[Ps.36.4|Ps 36:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשְׂכִּיל‎</span> as substantive [[Ps.14.2|Ps 14:2]] = [[Ps.53.3|Ps 53:3]], [[Prov.10.5|Prov 10:5]]; [[Prov.10.19|Prov 10:19]]; [[Prov.14.35|Prov 14:35]]; [[Prov.15.24|Prov 15:24]]; [[Prov.17.2|Prov 17:2]]; [[Job.22.2|Job 22:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִשָּׁה מַשְׂכָּ֑לֶת‎</span> [[Prov.19.14|Prov 19:14]]. — [[Jer.50.9|Jer 50:9]] has <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גִּבּוֺר מַשְׁכִּיל‎</span> according to Masora ([[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] [[BDB#Baer|Baer]] [[BDB#Gi|Gi]]), compare [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]], i.e. a child-slaying warrior; but <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> **Hiph\`il** ==elsewhere only== [[Hos.9.14|Hos 9:14]], of miscarriage; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] and most modern ([[BDB#Gf|Gf]] [[BDB#Gie|Gie]] [[BDB#Rothst|Rothst]]) read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשְׂכִּיל‎</span>, either ***skilful*** or ***fortunate.*** 

**6.** ***prosper, have success*** (compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup> [[1Sam.18.5|1Sam 18:5]]</sup>): absolute [[1Sam.18.15|1Sam 18:15]]; [[Isa.52.13|Isa 52:13]]; [[Jer.10.21|Jer 10:21]]; [[Jer.20.11|Jer 20:11]]; [[Jer.23.5|Jer 23:5]]; [[Josh.1.8|Josh 1:8]] ([[BDB#D|D]]); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>, v[[Josh.1.7|Josh 1:7]] ([[BDB#D|D]]) [[1Sam.18.5|1Sam 18:5]]; [[1Sam.18.14|1Sam 18:14]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּכָלֿ‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְכָלֿ‎</span> [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]] and others), compare [[2Kgs.18.7|2Kgs 18:7]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span>, [[Prov.17.8|Prov 17:8]]. 

**7.** ***cause to prosper:*** [[Deut.29.8|Deut 29:8]]; [[1Kgs.2.3|1Kgs 2:3]]([[BDB#D|D]]). 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂכַל‎</span>] **verb Pi\`el** ==lay crosswise== (so, and not √ I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span>, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵑ7]]<sup>**Jon**</sup> and modern, compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bind*** legs of beast, ***plait*** locks of hair); — ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂכֵּל אֶתיָֿדָיו‎</span> [[Gen.48.14|Gen 48:14]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]], however, ***prudentes fecit***, from √ I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span>.
